title: Can anyone get admission in IGNOU? - Quora
tags: College and University Admissions in India

response.answer_text: Yes- ofcourse ignou is open university and you can get admission but its depends on what stream you are going to get admission according to your back education background, for example I was student of DU sol and did my b.com but I was more Interested in computer so i took admission in MCA, Its toffee in Ignou what I have to do it. Hope this answers your question.
Yeahh…anyone can get..just check the Notification of the course..If u r eligible then probably u will get admission..

Yes at all. If you want to get admission in IGNOU, then you should have to go to ignou website which is, IGNOU - The People's University . There are several types of programs conducted by this University for e.g., certificate course, BDP(bachelor development program), Masters, etc. Hope you will be understood.
Hi, Yes……If you are eligible then probably you will get admission.
